creator: Nuansa Cerah Informasi
descriptionHtml:
This is a kind of airbus a320 aircraft knowledge test, covering the topics:

1. General Limitations
2. Flight Control Laws
3. CFM Powerplant
4. Flight Controls & Landing Gear
5. Fuel System
6. Hydraulic Systems
7. Oxygen, Lights, MEL
8. Electrics
9. Pneumatics & Air Conditioning
10. APU & Avionics Ventilation
11. Pressurisation
12. EFIS, ECAM, Comms
13. Navigation
14. Autoflight


Application features :

- Multiple-choice exercise
- There are 4 hints (50:50, SKIP Quiz, VOTE, Add TIME for answering), that can be used, but require coins that can be added by viewing Ad impressions
- More than 40 questions in one topic which in turn appear in 7 questions

Enjoy
descriptionShort: Test your knowledge of the Airbus A320

appDetails.developerAddress:
PT. NCI, Pelajar Pejuang 45 No. 43, Bandung 40263
West Java, Indonesia
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Latest updates
- adding new exam questions
